name: @hmcts/zephyr-automation-nodejs
description: Node.js library for Zephyr automation in HMCTS projects

scripts.build: yarn clean && tsc && cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.audit:check: yarn audit --recursive --environment production --json > yarn-known-issues-current || true && jq -s '[.[] | select(.type=="auditAdvisory") | .data.advisory.id] | sort' yarn-known-issues-current > current-ids.json && jq -s '[.[] | select(.type=="auditAdvisory") | .data.advisory.id] | sort' yarn-known-issues > known-ids.json && diff -q known-ids.json current-ids.json || (echo '‚ùå New vulnerabilities detected. Please review.' && exit 1)
